website_summaries.verdict: It doesn’t have a huge feature set, but this option is an accurate and solidly-constructed scale at a decent price.
pros: Simple setup — just remove the plastic strip and you’re good to go
Comes with a body measuring tape
cons: While it does come with batteries, they are sometimes dead on arrival
Some buyers have reported inaccurate readings that increase over time

customer_reviews.title: It says I'm chubby, consistently
customer_reviews.text: This scale weighs consistently time after time. That means I don't lose a half a lb if I shift my weight or get off, pray, get back on. It still says I'm chubby. I believe it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJMc

customer_reviews.title: Shattered Glass but was sent a replacement for free!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product for about 2 months. One day while cleaning, I went to pick up the scale so I could vacuum the bathroom floor. I gently grabbed the side of the scale and it completely shattered. I was so disappointed. After I wrote my first review on Amazon, I was contacted by an Etekcity customer support representative and they were extremely kind and wanted to be sure that I was satisfied with their product. They shipped me a brand new scale at zero cost to me. I’ve had it for almost a week now and it seems to be working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Maura W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It displays crazy weights!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work! I calibrated it then got on the scale and it said I was at least 30lbs less than what gym scale and the doctors scale says. As much as i wish I was that light I know I’m not. Every time I step on the scale I get a different weight. And by different I mean 10lbs heavier or lighter within minutes of each other. It makes no sense. I am very dissapppinted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a few days, I felt it was fairly accurate and it gave me consistent weights. But now all the screen will show is "LO." The first time I changed the batteries, and two days later the scale was dead again. I've now changed the batteries multiple times and I get the same thing, making the scale useless.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This scale worked the first time I used it, and after that it won't stay calibrated. After a few seconds in says error. I would not recommend it. 7/17/17 update Shortly after writing this review, I was contacted by the seller and was offered either a replacement scale or a refund. I was pleasantly surprised by this, as I didn't request either of these things, and it was proactive on their part after they read my review. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale & the measuring tape it came with. I will definitely rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Yani Diamond

customer_reviews.title: this scale gives very inconsistent reading
customer_reviews.text: Sadly enough, this scale gives very inconsistent reading. I purchased it for my mom who has a heart condition. I need to weigh her every day, same time, same surface to see if her weight changes (for medical reasons). I can have her step on scale 3 different times in 5 minute period and get 3 different weights. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer, Sharpsburg GA

customer_reviews.title: Oh Damn you sleek scale
customer_reviews.text: On Damn you sleek scale. I needed a new scale and your price was right. But when I unwrapped you - I fell in love with your sleak and modern design. Then it happened. I stepped on you and you wouldn't lie like my other scale. I tested to make sure what you were telling me was accurate. Yes. Sigh. I still love you, but now you have me focussed on getting those darn numbers down.
customer_reviews.author: David Wicks

customer_reviews.title: we were happy with it for a few month
customer_reviews.text: we were happy with it for a few month. Last week the glass shattered when my 15yr old stepped on it, it left a couple of cuts on the bottom of his foot. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Q

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at inaccuracy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale about 3 months ago based on the great reviews about accuracy. I haven’t had such luck. My initial weight is always a few pounds lighter than the second or third time I stepped back on. For example, today I stepped on and it was 163.8, got super excited and stepped on again and was 170.4, stepped on again and was 170.8. I calibrate my scale before I step on it but still get crazy results. A 7lbs difference when stepping on and off the scale is too big of a difference. I’m trying to lose weight and right now I don’t know if I’ve lost any
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: My scale stopped working correctly /:
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale about 3 weeks ago and I love it, but yesterday morning I encountered an issue. When you turn on the scale it doesn't start at 00.0, it starts at 12lbs and up, and never goes back to zero. I still really like the scale, its just very unfortunate that a new scale would have an issue like that in such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: sonce

customer_reviews.title: Not all scales are built the same
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine December 2017 and thought it worked great at first, but now I'm not so sure... I visibly lost weight so I thought the scale was accurate and then it began to tell me I went from 140-135 and sometimes it woukd end up at 130. I never thought i could weight that despite the progress i have made....Iturns out my sister has the same scale and I've either gained 25 pounds over the past week and a half or one of those scales is lying... Sad to say I'm not sure I would recommend the product based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: KaFuller

customer_reviews.title: "Lo"
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it started displaying "Lo" on the screen so I replaced the batteries and within 2-3 days it started displaying the message again. :( and now it has stopped turning on completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Precise, durable,and stylish weighing machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this weighing machines. Seems like it is built to last. I have been using it for a week now and shows precise readings. here are some of the pros and cons. Pros: 1. Gives precise readings using 4 sensors 2. Can use both Kg and Lb as measurement unit 3. Auto turn off when not in use 4. Rubber caps at the bottom to keep it in place 5. Battery easy to install 6. LOOKS AMAZING ! 7. Comes with free measurement tape Cons: 1. Cannot measure over 400 pounds 2. Does not work properly on mats or rugs (Have to use it on hard surfaces only) Except for few cons this is a great weighing machine to have
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: This scale works great. I tested the calibration prior to using it
customer_reviews.text: This scale works great. I tested the calibration prior to using it, and it was spot on The modern sleek design really appealed to me. It can complement just about any bathroom color or decor. I also like that it's very solid and has some weight to it. It's not made of cheap plastic like most other scales. My favorite feature is that this uses regular AA sized batteries rather than the typical CR2032.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Initially was very nice and worked well. It sits on a ceramic floor and does not get moved or anything. Suddenly it is no longer calibrated. It doesn't go back down to zero when i try to wake it up. It wakes up to random huge numbers and cannot get to zero. Waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: ZG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need l. Came with a nice retracting measuring tape.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Fragile & kills batteries quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this scale but I have two MAJOR complaints of why I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. 1st for some reason it’s batteries would die within one week of using and you would need to replace - my roommates and I just started taking them out and only putting them in when we were going to weigh ourselves. 2nd is that it is very fragile, one of the first times I set it down the glass chipped and today i moved it (not aggressively at all) and the entire scale shattered which honestly caught me off guard - be careful if you get it
customer_reviews.author: Rylie

customer_reviews.title: great apparently I have re-gained 5 pounds in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Two days ago this scale told me I was 213, yay I lost 5 pounds in a month! Today it told me I was 218, great apparently I have re-gained 5 pounds in 2 days. My husband has had the same trouble, he stepped off and on it the other night three times and it gave him different measurements each time he did it. I have tried to re-calibrate this scale according to the instructions. I've popped out the batteries and tried to reset it completely. I think I have a dud here. Other people may like it, but I certainly do not. I'd return it, but It's not even worth it after you get done paying the shipping fees.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: exploded last night
customer_reviews.text: nice scale while it lasted, but it exploded in the middle of the night. no one using it. nothing fell on it. we do not have ghosts. (i think). no animals to jump on it. it woke us all up. i thought someone threw a rock into a window. a thousand pieces of tempered glass. took us an hour to clean it up. can't recommend a scale that self destructs. maybe try a different brand than Etekcity.
customer_reviews.author: jai-f

customer_reviews.title: It’s a weird scale.
customer_reviews.text: It making the 2 year mark and I’ve had problems since day 1. I’m sure I got a faulty one....when trying to get a weight the first time I step onto the scale is about 3-5 lbs heavier than if I step on the scale a second and third time. The second and third time readings are always the same and so are those there after. Now as I step on it the first time it’s almost 10lbs heavier, after stepping on it again for the second time it’s the correct weight. I’m not sure why mine is such a bipolar scale.
customer_reviews.author: Victoriaa

customer_reviews.title: Most attractive bathroom scale I've ever owned.  Accurate and comes with a bonus tape measure.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and accurate. Came nicely packaged and works great. Came with a fabric tape measure with a cool locking and retractable feature to get accurate measurements even in places you can't see before you move the tape. Unexpected and a pleasant surprise. My favorite thing about this scale is that you can see right through it to the floor beneath so it's very low profile - most people won't even notice it so it's not a glaring feature in my bathroom. Digital readout stabilizes and stays visible for several moments after you step off the scale so that you aren't fluctuating while you lean forward to read it. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and reliable
customer_reviews.text: These digital scales are quick and easy to use. Pros: - Reliable reading (matches weight from Drs office) - Quick - apply pressure to activate, wait a moment for reading to set to zero, step on and weight flashed up in a couple of seconds. - Came with batteries and ready to use straight out of the box. - Tempered glass design in modern looking and matches most decors. Cons: - Need to be placed on a flat hard floor for reliable results. If you use on an uneven or soft surface then the results can be several pounds off. - No a smart scale (doesn't sync weight to phone etc)
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and imprecise
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for about 6 months now and have concluded that it is worthless. "Waking up" the scale will sometimes take more than one try. The scale has a sort of "memory" to give it a false precision, so if you step off the scale and then step back on with something within it's precision limits, it will still tell you the exact same weight as before. This indicates that the last digit of the scale is meaningless. Furthermore, I've found the scale will fluctuate by well over a pound of you let it go back to sleep between weighing. Given this lack of precision, I have no reason to trust the general accuracy of the scale either.
customer_reviews.author: Zaky-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This scale performed well for 13 months or so then started eating batteries. They'd last for 3 weeks or so before failing. Replaced with new Duracells and 3 or so weeks later all the scale would read is "LO". Also, the tape measure they sent along with it started at about 1-7/8", not "0". This is laughable! All-in-all I'll stay clear of Elekcity in the future and so should you!
customer_reviews.author: jaxbme

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Clean and it Works...
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a scale, but did NOT like what the scale would read. Started getting back into fitness, so I decided it was time to finally get one. This scale is in all honesty: a simple, clean scale that actually works. You place it on the floor, use one foot to press the scale and slightly apply pressure which activates the senor, then you step on it and viola! Easy to use, nice-bright led screen...no complaints. The glass is easy to clean and looks extremely modern wherever you decide to place it. Only time will tell how long this last for, but so far ★★★★★.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and accurate
customer_reviews.text: You can't love a scale when it reports the truth! Therefore, 4 stars and not 5. Well, this one does report pretty much spot on. Surprisingly, inexpensive and serves as an accurate reminder of why we all need a scale. It is often a deal of the day, so if you are in the need of something to replace that old scale that's been handed down from generation to generation or perhaps, your old digital falsely reports your weight, regardless of plus or minus, this one will definitely do the trick. Luckily, it doesn't announce the weight, just simply displays it. Afterall, there's no reason to share the info with the world unless you have a need to. :-) Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: greyfox47

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received in timely manner. Item was packaged well. It came with the measuring tape. The scale works well. I had just been weighed at the doctor before receiving my Etekcity scale & I weighed the same on it as I did at the doctor’s office. Item was as described and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ACCURATE AND EASY TO READ
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. Just take it out of the box, put it on the floor, step on it, get off it, and you are set! Works great and is easy to read. Judging by the doctor's scale, I would say this is quite accurate. Looks very nice. The glass takes away the "black box on the floor" look and blends in with everything. You don't even notice it's there so you can leave it out all the time ( I know people who actually put their scales away). Have only had it a short time but I am happy I decided on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Tough to re-set
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine for the first couple of months. Now I step on the scale and it says I weigh 373 lbs! Not correct. My spouse last weighed 126 pounds at her doctors office, and when the scale was working properly, now it reads over 250 pounds. Re-calibrating, taking out the batteries for several days has not corrected the issue either. Done with these digital scales.
customer_reviews.author: Max La Paz

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for a weight control plan.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for motivation to continue my weight control plan and diet program during this Covid-19 virus pandemic. Since the virus lockdown I have not been able to use the workout facilities that I normally use on a weekly basis. I was doing fine with my program but I was unable to monitor my weight loss/gain until I purchase this scale. It helps me keep within the boundaries of my desired weight limits on a regular basis. My 91 year old mother even uses it now. It's very easy to read and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Highsmith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scale, not sure about accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I was getting inconsistent readings so I decided to step on the scale with a 5 pound weight to see if the scale was able to accurately add 5 pounds to my weight. I didn’t - it added 3.5 pounds. I have it on a flat hardwood surface on my bathroom and I followed the instructions. A little disappointing but i guess if you’re just keep track of your relative weight (heavier or lighter than the day before) this scale does it.
customer_reviews.author: HoolioCZ

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS A SOLID FLAT SURFACE
customer_reviews.text: So unfortunately the majority of my apartment is carpet and this requires a solid flat surface to get an absolute accurate reading. I've stepped on the scale and shifted it around on the same floor and got all different readings within 30 seconds. I've tried another floor in my apart and got totally different readings as well. It seems to be rather temperamental, but it's only been a few days of trying it out so I'll give it the benefit of the doubt for now.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC WALTERS

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, simplicity at its best.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was trying to buy something that had wifi and would sync with the training apps on my phone. I read a lot of reviews on this and there always seemed to be some issue with conectivity and the prices were very high. I chose this scale mainly because of the reviews and the simpiclity. It arrived as stated and could not have been easier to set up. Take it out of the box and put the batteries in and that was it. Looks great and works great. As far as we can tell it is very accurate. We put our "spring" scale out for retirement. So far so go. I would highely recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jetsss

customer_reviews.title: Machine defective
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work the few times I used it. I hadn’t used it in a couple of months and it is no longer functioning. I changed the batteries to be sure. When you step on the scale, the numbers revolve and never stop! It says I. 20 lbs lighter than I am! Although, I like the number a lot better, it is not accurate. Disappointed. I have had it under 6 months! Amazon does. It seems amazon doesn’t give an option to return when defective, so I decided to leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Initial view
customer_reviews.text: The scale with batteries installed, just remove the plastic tab and ready to go. Just as described the scale turned on just by stepping on. My previous line you had to tap to turn on. Zeroing was easy. When compared to my current scale they were .2 lbs different. When I tried to weigh a 2lb bag of rice it weighed in at 00.0.
customer_reviews.author: G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: I liked it when it worked and now I 've seen GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought this on July 18 and it quit working this morning. I usually weigh once a week, so that's not much use from this scale. I liked it when it worked, simple, just shows the weight, no bells or whistles. Now to find another one😕 AFTER POSTING THE ABOVE I WAS CONTACTED BY ETEKCITY CUSTOMER SERVICE (THRU AMAZON) AND AFTER A COUPLE OF EMAIL EXCHANGES I WAS OFFERED A REPLACEMENT, AT NO COST . IT ARRIVED TODAY AND WORKS FINE. I'M A HAPPY ETEKCITY CUSTOMER!
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in the first year
customer_reviews.text: First sign of something wrong was when the screen says battery low after recently replacing the batteries. Then it starts saying it more and more often until finally it only takes minutes for a permanent failure saying "battery low". It wasn't the multiple batteries I tried - it was the unit. I am back to using my old Krups spring-scale and prefer it. I am finally tossing the unit today after tripping over it the basement for awhile now.
customer_reviews.author: Constant

customer_reviews.title: looks good and works very well
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an older digital scale that stopped woking after 10 years and this one looked good and got some good rating. Well it does look good. I like the clear glass so I can see the floor under it as it doesn't look big. It is accurate as I weighed myself and then held a 5 pound bag of flour and I was exactly 5 pounds heaver. It is easy to read and a real nice function it is automatic on. My old scales had to be tapped to turn on. Over the years the "dental tap" turned into almost a kick to wake it up (probably didn't help its life expectancy!). Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: RGB

customer_reviews.title: Relatively consistent, and the battery life s good.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is relatively accurate unit. The display is easy to read even in daylight setting. The original battery has lasted over 1 year and still going strong. The repeated testing with the dumb-bell weight of 5 and 10 lb held in my hand, yielded around 0.2 to 0.3 pound variances. The bathroom scale seems to be water resistant and have help up well in past year. The only negative I could think is the turn-on time. One have to tap the glass surface to start the self-calibration and wait few seconds before getting back on the scale. It has lasted over year without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The scale is perfect for those just wanting to know what they weigh. It has a bit of substance to it, and with the rubber feet, it doesn't slide around on the floor. The read-out is extremely clear and easy to read. It's a great size for my small bathroom. The style is contemporary and quite attractive. It came with a very handy (but kind of irrelevant) tape measure, and no mention in the packaging as to why. The vendor shipped as promised, and the price is quite reasonable for the high level of quality. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammig

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Now don’t get me wrong, you get what you paid for but this could be better. The whole point of the scale is to be accurate and I wanted to update from my old scale since ig was looking old but still worked fine. I decided to go with this but, the numbers in it just seem off. I’ve tried calibrating and I still can’t seem to get a 100% accurate measurement even after using items that I know the exact weight of.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Suarez

customer_reviews.title: works fine, but wastes batteries
customer_reviews.text: The scale itself is fine, but it shows a low battery indicator when the batteries are at about 75% state of charge. Or just above 1.4V. This means you can't use a NiMH rechargeable battery which is about 1.2V nominal. In other words, you need really fresh disposable alkaline batteries and end up with partially used batteries. On the plus side, my batteries lasted around a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fast Readings, Easy to Use, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the unit feels durable. The readings seem very fast and accurate. I get the same measurement every time. I really like the included measuring tape. Very well designed tape for measuring height, biceps, ect... The scale included batteries, just need to pull a little tab by battery compartment door to activate. Very simple and accurate. Only need to calibrate once, or if it got moved around. Great Price and seems quality. I try to be thoughtfull and honest in all my reviews. Please use the like button if this review was helpfull, Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable scale
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale about 8-9 months ago. The original one stopped working within a week or two and customer service replaced it. My replacement had been going strong until last week. Every time you step on the scale it gives a different reading, anywhere from 3-20 lbs difference. I’ve tried everything to recalibrate and even changed the batteries but nothing has solved the issue. Good scale when it’s working but not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Trempe

customer_reviews.title: Great scale... bar none!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this scale for about 21 months now and it wonderful. Easy to use, easy to read, very accurate and looks good as long as you clean it once in a while... being that it's made of glass, sits on bathroom floor with hair and hair spray raining down and sweaty feet. I still haven't changed the battery(s) yet. And, I use it each and every day. I know.... I have an issue. My wife won't tell me how often, but I hear her on it most mornings, too. It makes a thump noise when stepping off as it sits on a tile floor. Again, best scale I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Honest Scale
customer_reviews.text: What a great scale. I replaced a scale that left me frustrated because it would vary my weight by up to three pounds every time I stepped on it. Not this scale . . . it is always within a tenth of a pound. Display is easy to read too. It is not slippery and footprints are not a problem. It is worth more than I paid for it. I did NOT get this for free or at a discount in exchange for my review; I don't buy products that do that.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Blomberg

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my first scale but the seller contacted me and sent me a replacement. Seems like one of the functions in the first scale was broken . Now that they sent me a second one I don’t have any more issues and satisfied with the scale . The seller was also was very quick to contact me and very nice about the whole situation. I like that the screen lights up makes it very easy to see the weight . Great scale over all
customer_reviews.author: julia erastov

customer_reviews.title: very easy to read digital weight screen
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design with a large print, very easy to read digital weight screen. I tested it on several different hard surface flooring areas of my home and the readings were very consistent. It will be interesting to see how this compares to the dreaded doctor's office scales. My last scale, a HealthoMeter, purchased in 1994 was regularly about 4lbs off, on the light side, and it was quite large and heavy. I'm happy this is smaller and lighter weight...much more stylish and unobtrusive!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is Key!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about this scale is that it is accurate. Or, to say, that every time I step back on the scale (within the same few minutes), it gives the exact same reading. Whereas the scale I just replace would fluctuate a couple lbs within the same 1 to 2 minutes. That was super frustrating, when you're working really hard to lose every single pound. This scale does NOT do that. Even when I step right back on and hope it'll go lower. LOL! Also, it's pretty, which is always I bonus. So glad I bought it!! And, almost didn't because I'd been told this type shatters. Had it over a month and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scale because it looks just like one I have at another house. This one worked out of the box, which is great, but sometimes I really have to stomp on it to get it to zero out and get ready for a weigh in. The first time it happened, I stepped on it a few times and got nothing to light up. I changed the batteries but it still happened. With a few more aggressive stomps, it started working and has worked almost every time for a couple of weeks. I've never had this problem with my other one except when the battery is low. So, a little inconsistent, but fine most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Terryh

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale. Now for accuracy, I don’t know. Never tested it to be sure it’s accurate. But it works perfect for me. I don’t know how other people shattered it. I’ve run into it and kicked it repeatedly and it’s still intact lol I step on, step off, sets to zero and I step back on. No issues for me. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela I. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: This scale is nice looking, but I’ve noticed that it isn’t very accurate or consistent within a few pounds. For example, if I weigh myself three times in a row with 15 minutes in between (not eating/drinking or otherwise doing anything that should change my weight), the weights will fluctuate up to 2-3 pounds. My old scale would perhaps fluctuate 0.1 or 0.2, but not this widely. At this point I’ll just keep it, but I’m a little disappointed. If you’re focused on close tracking, I’d recommend picking a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 years, but still a good scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one back in August 2017. This scale is easy to use, looks good, and price is reasonable. However, recently it stopped working. At first I thought it's due to battery. But same issue even after using new battery. Considering it's been 2 years, I decided to go ahead and buy another scale (different model) from EtekCity. Would have given 4 stars it it didn't failed after 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: StarDust

customer_reviews.title: battery problem - keeps draining batteries
customer_reviews.text: This scale is accurate however it quickly drains batteries even when you are not using it. I have used this scale maybe once every week and within the third week the batteries complain they are low. I have tried rechargeable and also new non-rechargeable batteries for the last 2+ years and the same results. DO NOT buy this scale as you will continually be replacing batteries - maybe that is how they expect you to keep the weight down? Going back and forth to the store to buy batteries to feed the scale?
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Received a Defective Scale - Fluctuates Wildly
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the 10,000+ reviews on here would indicate this scale was of good quality, but I was wrong! After following all the product instructions and placing it on a hardwood floor the scale numbers still varied wildly and were not able to tare correctly. Stepping on and off resulted in different numbers every time (usually gains and losses between 0.4-1.2lb.). Worse is that stepping on it 2 min. later resulted in more than a 10lb. increase and the thing then "phantom" tared at 11.2lb! If I could gain and lose weight that quickly I doubt I'd need a scale, LOL. I will definitely be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kurry

customer_reviews.title: Good option.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple - does what you want it to do. Accuracy is OK, consistently high compared to fitness center scales by about 0.8 ponds which is just fine. Precision is about 0.2 to 0.4 ponds - fine for something that's not a high tech precision lab instrument. The readout is in even tenths - 0.2 pound increments. It does not play the games my precious scale "LetsFIt" did - which consistently gave a close the previous reading rather than the actual weight it detected - which was really stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but terribly inaccurate. Stepped on it last night and it said 204, I thought that couldn’t be right so I waited and tried again. 211. Wow what a significant difference, so I try again. 220. We have a problem here now it gave me numbers that far off. I wish I could return this but the window closed of course. This is super disappointing because my significant other used this scale for a weight loss challenge and now I’m doubting the validity of the results and there was a lot of money on the line.
customer_reviews.author: kmw wyo

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this scale.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, great price, seems to be accurate. I've weighed myself several times on two separate days. The first day never varied by more than 2/10ths (.2 lbs) of a pound. I weighed one pound more the next day and the scale never varied from the first time to the last. Each day, I weighed myself several times within a short time, so the result wouldn't be affected by eating or bathroom visits. The accuracy was a pleasant surprise after reading some of the negative comments that can be found for any of the digital scales for sale on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John R Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap digital scale, and its numbers were all over the place. This scale seems to be very accurate. I compared the scales side by side, and this one gave consistent readings across multiple measurements. My old scale seemed to have some kind of memory that made it seem consistent, but if I had someone else stand on it before I stood on it again then the reading would shift. It's really interesting to observe how our weight changes throughout the day now that we have an accurate scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it shatters
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these so far. My wife accidentally stubbed her toe on the first, and it shattered into a zillion pieces of glass. So we bought another and the same thing happened to me. Being barefoot in a sea of broken glass isn't pleasant. My toe wasn't even bruised from the stub, but that was still enough to destroy the scale. Aside from that unfortunate vulnerability, the scale looks good, and is very convenient to use. Unfortunately in my case, this one is apparently accurate, as it consistently tracked the fancy scale in my doctor's office. Its predecessor (a different brand) generously read about 8 pounds low, which was good for my self esteem.
customer_reviews.author: DAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy scale, but may weigh light?
customer_reviews.text: Good scale, feels sturdy. Doesn't feel like I'm standing on some flimsy glass surface, feels very sturdy and solid. Backlight helps in low light conditions. I have another scale, and regularly weigh myself on a third one at the gym. This one says I'm the lightest, followed by my other home scale, and the gym scale says I'm the heaviest. About a 3-4 lb discrepancy between the three scales. So, this scale *may* weigh light, or it may be the accurate one whereas the others may weigh heavy. In any case, I like being lighter than heavier, so I'm happy with this one lol!
customer_reviews.author: Allan RTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The scale is not accurate it says you weigh one ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale is not accurate it says you weigh one thing the next your either 6 pounds heavier or lighter. Tried everything to fix and calibrate it
customer_reviews.author: Gary and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Just step on the scale to activate it, wait until it zeroes, then step on again, and take a look at the numbers. I've weighed myself in the morning, and then been weighed at the doctor's office later in the day. The results are very similar taking in to account that at home I weigh myself without clothing. With the results being close, I feel pretty confident this scale is accurate for a spot weight (I'm trying to look at trends more than one number).
customer_reviews.author: goldenlvrTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of this brand.
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought the same brand 6 months ago or so and love it! The style is so nice and it works quick if that makes sense....it tells your weight the second you stand on it. My daughter whipped my old one across the house and the glass came up, I was going to glue it down but didn't want to chance it bot being accurate. Because I loved it ap much I bought the same brand again (this one). My last one was black so I went with the clear one this time, it hasn't gotten dirty yet like I was afraid of soni dont think I'll have to clean it like I originally thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jess1214

customer_reviews.title: Extremely reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I received the scale several days ago and I have been very happy with it so far. Set-up/calibration was a breeze, and I like the minimalist, see-through design. But those features would be pointless if it did not reliably provide my weight. The scale it replaced would deviate by as much as 2 full pounds each time I got on and off it. With this scale, if I reweigh myself 5 times in a row, I get the exact same weight each time. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: DrBB

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries within a week and then no good after
customer_reviews.text: The batteries were dead within a week. Once I replaced them with quality batteries I expected the scale to start working well again. I went through the calibration process and didn’t move the scale at all and it was completely unreliable. The weights were varying widely from 175lbs to 189lbs at a given time for me. I stood on it in the same place even over the sensors but to no avail. This is one of the better looking scales on amazon so I was hoping for a better outcome. As it is with the time driving to the ups store to send the return, I’d have been better off just driving to the store to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this scale. First, I wanted one that was stable, so that it didn't tip or lurch as I stepped on it, like the one that this is replacing. Then I wanted to make absolutely sure that it was easily read/seen. The blue numbers are just large enough that even without my glasses on, I can see the numbers. This is the type of scale that goes in any bathroom with any decor. I also love how easily it can be reset. I've had two other scales and both had problems with resetting. I'm very glad I spotted this one. For me, where I have placed it, it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but useless and inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. After months of use, it is safe to say this scale is wildly inaccurate and unreliable. I've been using it in parallel with a scale at my gym at similar times and conditions, and while the gym scale is roughly consistent, the etekcity scale varies widely from day to day and even hour to hour by up to 8 pounds - an unacceptable margin of error. Calibrating did not help resolve the inaccuracy. While the scale is aesthetically very nice, it is not reliable for tracking body weight trends.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Greattasticawesomesauce!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so many things to say about this scale! Okay the first part was a lie, it's a scale folks, it measures the body that you wear and so far seems to do a fantastic job. Let's break this down into two categories. Pros: It looks amazing. It works quickly. It's accurate (tested against 2 other scales) Cons: None.
customer_reviews.author: InkedApple83

customer_reviews.title: CAME BROKEN! *scale box still sealed*
customer_reviews.text: It came BROKEN! no type of foam protecting or plastic whatsoever! I didn’t even open the box, shattered glass spread over my couch and floor. I’m so thankful my nephew wasn’t around when I the box!!!!! (He was in the kitchen) I didn’t even open the package. It’s going STRAIGHT to the trash! I don’t even want to see how the scale looks at this point. The cleaning is going to be a hassle. Edit: (+5 stars) Amazon gave me a full refund, and repurchased for next day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'd change about this scale is that I would use some different material for the feet. You cannot simply push it across the floor to move it, you have to pick it up and move it. We usually keep our scale in an out of the way place and move it every time we want to use it. Clearly that's just a personal preference that has no impact on the quality of the scale. Overall we're very pleased with it. There is one other thing I don’t like about this new scale... it’s too honest! I’m fatter than I thought!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ken Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied heart failure patient
customer_reviews.text: Heart failure patients (of which I am one) are instructed to weigh themselves daily because quick weight gain which may not be noticed by the patient can lead to serious crises and hospitalizations. If noticed quickly by using an accurate scale, medical intervention can usually avert the crisis and hospitalization. I researched scales the best way I could and purchased this one. I have not had it very long but I have tested it for consistency which is the most important feature for me. It's consistent, easy to use and read. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHNV

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: very sleek and seemingly accurate scale. There's about a .2lb variance if I wait for a second and weigh myself again, but as long as that's acceptable to you, it's perfectly fine. It's a little cold in the morning with bare feet because it's glass and all, but I don't personally mind much. I think it was a great purchase and recommend it to any looking to watch their weight for any given reason.
customer_reviews.author: cookie_monster

customer_reviews.title: Helps Me Keep My Weight In Check
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple digital scale. What else is there to say? I will say that it has helped me monitor my weight very well! It keeps track of weight in .2 Pound increments in case you are wondering if it does odd rounding. The glass surface is extremely tough as well! I've hit the scale with my foot & accidentally sent it flopping up & smacking down on the tile floor & it never broke! I would highly recommend this for anyone who needs a good, reliable digital weight scale for keeping your weight in check! :D
customer_reviews.author: TechAzn

customer_reviews.title: only one problem
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine scale. The one problem is that it is sold with heavy duty batteries included. Heavy duty batteries are the worst batteries you can get and are very prone to leaking. So if you get this scale throw away those batteries and get some quality alkaline or lithium batteries. That is the only reason I dinged it a star.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: We love the style and the display but jeez, we're putting new batteries in every week!!! Not sure what's going on, maybe we have a defective scale? Not sure, hopefully they're not all like this. UPDATE 09/03/18: Shortly after posting this review I received an email for Rose from the Etekcity Customer Support Team. She explained that they believe the issue is caused by malfunction of the PCB board, and they will resolve my problem by immediately sendind out a replacement, which they did. I received the new scale and things are good. Thank you to Rose and Etekcity for their concern and the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: scoots

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale with Large Easy to Read Numbers
customer_reviews.text: This scale is perfect at doing one thing, weighing your body. The output is nice large numbers. It reads your weight quickly (takes about 2 seconds). It automatically shuts off the scale to save battery. It has a nice clean look with the glass and silver accents. I highly recommend this scale to anyone wanting something simple for measuring weight at home. It has no connectivity or smart features, so no risk of some company tracking your weight and knowing about you.
customer_reviews.author: Axcro

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use directions, no problem starting it up. Looks nice and has a good display. However, everything weighed in well under what it actually weighed. Never got an accurate reading, always off by between 15 to 80 lbs. Wildly varying answers weighing the same item. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Deniece Black

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to love a scale, but this one is nice
customer_reviews.text: I mean we all really want a scale that displays only the numbers we want to see, I know. This one doesn't do that, unfortunately. What it does do is show you can accurate number, though, so I guess it's doing its job. I also really like that it is clear and sleek and slim so it's easy to kind of put to the side where it isn't eyeing me all the time. The only minor thing about it is that if you live in a place with pets, it does collect a little bit of fur, and maybe the occasional nose slobber, so regular cleaning is a thing.
customer_reviews.author: aimeed22

customer_reviews.title: Blows Through Batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scale a year now and feel I need to let you all know it’s BLOWS through batteries. I put brand new ones in 6 days ago and it’s already saying it’s too low to function. This is the third time in a month that I’ll have to change the batteries. Thus, it’s just cheaper to get a new scale than change the batteries weekly. I don’t recall it Eating up batteries when I first got it, but a year later and I can tell you it’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie L.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: depending on if you have more weight on the ball of your foot or your heel, your weight will vary by 1lb or more. Not only that but it seems to be programmed to be "consistent" over accurate. Meaning I will stand on it, get 151.2lbs. Get off and get back on and it will seem to read a slightly higher reading by a few ounces but then revert back to 151.2lbs. Now if some else uses it, and then I get back on it afterward again (3rd attempt), it will have a say 151.5lbs. I don't trust this scale at all. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Got the scene and was so happy to use it. Looks nice. Stepped on it once and got an accurate reading. After that it says that I'm 40 or 50 lbs. I'm an adult Male so you can see why that weight would be an issue for me. Have calibrated it several times and still it says I'm 40 lbs. I've switched batteries, made sure the floor was leveled, made sure it was measured in lbs not kg and still nothing works. What a waste of money. And my scale never came with a measuring tape. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: After getting weights varying by 15 pounds in the space of 10 minutes, I knew I could not trust my old bathroom scale, and then it kept giving me error messages. This looks sharp, is very easy to read, and seems to be quite accurate, and reads in tenths of a pound. (it can also read out metric numbers by moving a switch.) And the price was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Shows Exact Same Weight, Even When I Pick Up Half-Pound Item Between Weightings
customer_reviews.text: This scale remembers your last weight and when you weigh yourself again, if the new weight is within about half a pound of the previous weight, it shows the PREVIOUS weight. This seems to be a way of tricking people into thinking that the scale's readings are more repeatable than they really are. They don't disclose this behavior in their description of the product.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael

customer_reviews.title: Can't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: This is my second failure with a similar scale. This one works fine, but will run out of batteries fast. So I replaced the batteries after a week of normal use. Then I let it sit with the batteries in it for a week, and when I go to use it, it has no battery power again. I didn't even use it once on the new batteries. I've resolved to keep it stored with batteries out of the device, and to put batteries in only when I need them. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: twinklefingers

customer_reviews.title: Really great value!
customer_reviews.text: This scale was so easy to set up and start using. The digital display helps track accurately how much weight you have been losing. The Body Tape Measure was a really great bonus! It actually motivated me to start keeping track of my measurements through my weight loss journey. REALLY GREAT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Morales

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The scale itself is very nice looking. That is about where the positives end. This things eats through batteries like they are nothing so be prepared to replace them every couple days (if you are lucky). The other big issue is that weights are never the same. You can get on it multiple times one after the other and get different numbers every time. Not accurate at all and I highly recommend finding a different scale to spend you money on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Benders

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate.. shows smaller weight (compared to other scales)
customer_reviews.text: This scale always show around 1.1lb / 0.5 kg lesser weight. I always wait for 0.0 then weigh. I am sure of its inaccuracy as I have 2 other scales at home (both of which if display 'x'kg weight, this scale displays 'x-0.5'kg) and bought this one for one of our bathrooms due to reviews. May be I got the defective piece!! I would have been very happy if this worked accurately as it looks nice and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: SDave

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Readings
customer_reviews.text: I had this scale for over a year ago. At first, it was quite accurate. But over the year, it began to register false readings and fluctuated weights as high as 6 pound differences. I contacted the company (when there was still an option to do so). They emailed me once about the issue. When I responded, to date, they never sent me a return email. It also cannot be moved from room to room without the fluctuation of weights increasing. The scale repeatedly requires re-calibration that does not always work. Overall, I am disappointed with this scale and advise potential buyers to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Scale? Possible?
customer_reviews.text: My previous scale was off by a pound or two every time I stood on it. I’d had enough. I bought the glass version of this one and I love it. It is accurate and displays the same weight every time I step on it. Beautiful, lit display is easy to read, and the clear glass shows off my nice tile floor, blending in very nicely. The only negative would be how cold it is when I step on it... brrr.
customer_reviews.author: Schneb

customer_reviews.title: Love the scale
customer_reviews.text: Love the scale. So simple. I hate the overly complicated ones that store history and show you what you should be at and bla bla bla.... I just want a scale that looks nice and tells me my weight. On and off.... piece of cake. Love it
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheid

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought this ages ago
customer_reviews.text: I am SO enjoying not having to turn on the light in the room to see what I weigh. I love having my weight show up in increments of .2 pounds (if it's supposed to weigh in increments of .1, I've not seen it). It's nice not having to tap on the scale to get it to turn on; it's awake and ready as soon as I step on. Perhaps I won't appreciate the lit screen as much after I have cataract surgery in a few years, but in all honesty I doubt that my love for this scale will fade.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bitney

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIGITAL SCALE
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchase this scale. I bought one to keep at my daughter’s house bc I visit for a month at a time. It’s so easy....get on & it flashes 3x and then stops.....there’s your weight. I had a WW scale and I could get on and get weighed and 5 minutes later I got a weight 3-5 lbs different AND I had to tap it and get a zero before getting on. THIS ONE IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: jonie

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever. Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I can get on and off this scale and never weigh the same. Talking about 30 lb difference in 3 minutes. Amazing diets. Looks great....works not so much. Floor level, batteries fresh, just crappy product. Save your $$$. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Scale is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I weighed myself in the morning before using the restroom. My weight should have gone down after using the toilet. Instead,it went up .2 lb!! Immediately after weighing myself on the Etekcity scale which has .2 lb increments. I weighed myself on the WeightWatcher scale which has .1 lb increments and found that I was .6 lb lighter than on the Etekcity! I do not recommend the Etekcity.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design, Faulty Performance
customer_reviews.text: This scale is beautifully designed, very sturdy and there is practically no set up involved. My issue though is that about 1 month into using it, it started going haywire. I can step on it 6 different times and get 6 wildly different results. Yesterday it said I was both 286 and 76 pounds but my actual weight is well below 286 and well about 76. I've tried taking the batteries out and letting it sit hoping that it would reset itself and switching between lbs and kg but nothing helps. This product has a lot of good reviews, so maybe I just got a faulty one, but I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Anita Wilson

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate and over priced
customer_reviews.text: I can't calibrate it Instructions are a lie I have an industrial scale at work. It says I'm 132 with my work gear on (123 with it off) This scale says I'm 117 with it off, 123 with it on Our scale has to be on for work. This scale gives a different reading whether within minutes or hours (115. 115. 117. 120. And hour later 135) You know. It makes my girl feel good, and its within 10 pounds accuracy Not too bad. But considering the price, its awful
customer_reviews.author: Cole Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very good.  Price, 2 day FAST delivery.  Great.
customer_reviews.text: From ANOTHER store...bought one which immediately needed return BUT THIS=A+. COSTCO had a deal on this same design...'got one...immediately didn't work right...returned. ...so, with hesitation, bought this at BETTER price than "deal" elsewhere......after a month ........just great. Used at least a couple times daily...and double checked in accuracy against a gym weights scale......happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hitchens RIP

customer_reviews.title: fast and consistent
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my previous digital scale. This one is fast, usually just a few seconds. It barely 'bounces' around on weight while you standing on it. If you get on and off it several times it will display the same weight each time. Very consistent. Even if you move it the weight it displays is consistent. I don't know if it is 'accurate' but I do trust if it shows I have gained or lost a pound or two. I think the consistency is more important than being 100% accurate on your weight.
customer_reviews.author: MJL

product_meta.title: Etekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale with Body Tape Measure, 8mm Tempered Glass, 400 Pounds Scales
feature_bullets: Note - For best accuracy, please place the scale on a hard, flat surface. Avoid carpet or soft surface
Accuracy - Built with 4 high-precision sensors, delivering results with a 0.2 lb / 0.1kg accuracy
Strong Design - Thick and durable 8 mm tempered glass platform enough to provide years of fitness tracking
Versatile Features - Auto-on/off, auto calibration, low battery and overload indication, with backlit LCD
Package Contents: 1 x Digital Weight Scale, 1 x User Manual, 2 x 1.5V AAA batteries, 1 x Tape Measure

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
